Text: Works perfectly, fast download, great game. Bit short on content but I feel play time vs download time was good. :)
Thanks again Wanderer! Your the man/woman whichever the case may be!

Works great Wanderer, another great upload (as usual). Do you think you could get Cultures 3+4 up, or a couple of the D&D (i.e. NWN 2, Temple of Elemental Evil, etc) games on special that don't have a GOG release (or not very good ones) on the pirate Bay yet?
Does anyone knows in which folder of windows the saved game files are stored?
